sentences.en: A highly appreciated sneaker due to the clear shape and strong colours.
sentences.cn: 一双高度被赞赏的运动鞋由于清楚的形状和强的颜色.

sentences.en: I am a sneaker, more than a fad.
sentences.cn: 我不是普通的运动鞋, 也不是稍纵即逝的潮流.

sentences.en: More than this, the sneaker is also a versatile canvas for creative and infinitely unique customisations.
sentences.cn: 不只这些, 运动鞋也是多种多样的帆布的创意和独特的定制.

sentences.en: Nike releases the Waffle Trainer, Sneaker, with Bill Bowerman's famous waffle outsole.
sentences.cn: 耐克发布华夫训练鞋, 有着闻名的比尔鲍尔曼的华夫大底.

sentences.en: Of course, Jordan's value to Nike goes beyond just sneaker and apparel sales.
sentences.cn: 当然, 乔丹对耐克公司的价值还不只是鞋和服装的销售.

sentences.en: Smooth leather upper in a lace up casual sneaker with stitching, overlay and metal stud trim.
sentences.cn: 在光滑皮革与缝合, 覆盖和金属钉装饰花边休闲鞋上.

sentences.en: Sneaker factory develops double star Huang Dao.
sentences.cn: 双星黄岛运动鞋厂开发.

sentences.en: Suitable , right and light suits and sneaker. Prepare a long T shirt or sweat coat.
sentences.cn: 着装轻巧,长跑时所穿的鞋袜应柔软 、 合脚. 应准备一件长T恤或运动外套.

sentences.en: The Blue Sneaker began to tell the Blue Shoe all about himself.
sentences.cn: 篮球鞋开始把所有关于自己的事情都告诉蓝鞋子.

sentences.en: The product has sneaker, boots and sole to wait.
sentences.cn: 产品有运动鞋 、 靴及鞋底等.

sentences.en: The sneaker comes with orange suede and white mesh on the upper.
sentences.cn: 运动鞋来与橙色绒面革和在鞋帮的白色滤网.

sentences.en: The winter [ sports ] and hardware business is a different animal than the sneaker and apparel business.
sentences.cn: 冬季运动和装备业务是与运动鞋和服装完全不同的东西.

sentences.en: This intermediate part, still can distinguish roughly for recreational leather shoes and recreational sneaker two kinds.
sentences.cn: 这个中间部分, 大致还可区分为休闲皮鞋与休闲运动鞋两类.

sentences.en: This time they collaborated on the Amir high top sneaker.
sentences.cn: 这次他们在贵族高梆的运动鞋合作了.

sentences.en: When Qiao Dangang entered NBA 1984, the prices that advertises for sneaker just began to value.
sentences.cn: 1984年乔丹刚进入NBA时, 为运动鞋做广告的行情刚开始看好.
